body.name: FDHUIJIA Rotating Bookshelf 360 Display 4 Tier Floor Standing Bookcase Storage Rack for Kids&Adults Solid Wood Book Shelf (4tier)
features: 360 degree rotating bookcase is made of solid pine wood, no paint, no odor, hand polished Eco-friendly and durable
【Size】Total height of bookcase: 51 inches (130cm). Height of each layer: 11.8 inches (30 cm). Diameter: 17.3 inches (44cm). Medium and large books can be placed
【Large capacity】Four open rotating shelves with 16 compartments it is both practical and organizing
【Very stable】This solid wooden bookcase adopts tenon and mortise technology, and its assembly is very simple. We have equipped screws where necessary to make the bookshelf more stable.
[Space Saving] The round bookshelf takes up little space and is very practical!
body.description: Rotating Bookshelf 360 Display 4 Tier Floor Standing Bookcase Storage Rack for Kids&Adults Solid Wood Book shelf

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: I normally don’t buy new furniture because of how terrible the material has become. When I saw this product I had high hopes and since it not something i could easily build on my own I went ahead and purchased it. The quality to price ratio in my eyes is phenomenal! The shipping was fast and nearly everything was perfect. I even received a screw driver in my box. That’s very thoughtful!The only cons are that some of the pilot hole were slightly off, but I managed to get it put together. And the base “spinning” isn’t great. However for the price I am more than content! Great product!If you like sturdy and well made furniture then this is definitely for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LOTS OF SCREWS
reviews.reviewText: Be prepared to screw in A LOT of screws. The instructions need to be clearer, by clearer, I mean in a literal sense. The images and even writing is very blurry, and the paper was so hastily thrown into the packaging that it was beyond crumpled up as well as torn.

reviews.reviewerName: Michael Brent Faulkner, Jr.Michael Brent Faulkner, Jr.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A perfect addition for any book lover
reviews.reviewText: I own lots of books. Books are absolutely wonderful. However, storing books requires space and shelving. That's where the fun comes in - finding just the right shelf for the amount of space in your residence. With limited space, and still possessing a love of physical books, the FDHUIJIA Rotating Bookshelf 360 Display Floor Standing Bookcase Storage Rack proved to be the perfect solution! An attractive, wooden shelf, this product checks off all the boxes. First, and foremost, it is sturdy. Furthermore, it doesn't take up too much space. As far as the difficulty of assembly, it's not too shabby. Often, its easy to find yourself redoing a step or two when assembling furniture, but, this product was straightforward, and provided great directions. If you are a book lover, and you desire a cute, practical way to display and store them, I highly recommend the FDHUIJIA Rotating Bookshelf 360 Display Floor Standing Bookcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hard to spin, predrilled holes not accurate
reviews.reviewText: Bought for our toddler but after putting together found out it is unfortunately very hard to spin. The whole shelf moves/scoots on the floor when you try to spin the shelf to rotate because the spin feature is not very smooth at all. Very disappointed. Multiples of the predrilled holes also were very inaccurate/off. Very low quality :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a solid piece of furniture. It is made of sturdy wood that is unfinished, which I like since I can make it match my room. It was easy to build and had good instructions. I only wish the top piece was a solid top to where you can’t see screws and the places where it fits like a puzzle. I plan on trying to fill them in with wood putty before painting it. I am very pleased with the quality of this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the 2 tier rotating bookshelf for my front porch reading nook. It is perfect for my small space!! I love that!I also love that it was so easy to put together. So much easier than I anticipated when I opened the box and saw all the pieces. Got it all put together in roughly 10 minutes.My only critique is that the wood seems to be without a finish. It is sanded nice a smooth but no finish. So that makes it harder to clean If something we’re to spill on it accidentally.So I will take the time to brush on a couple coats of poly.Even with that it is still worth it for real wood, in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love storing my books in cool shelves, and this is no exception. The 360 rotation aspect is awesome and lets me store a deceivingly large amount of books in there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice rotating book shelf.
reviews.reviewText: This natural wood rotating bookshelf is pretty nice. Assembly takes a bit of time, but once together it is solid. It rotates on its base. The slots are perfect for smaller books and novels, but larger books won't work. This unique shelf looks good and goes with most all decor.
